content.html: You can't overstate how giant TikTok has become, so quickly, among younger consumers. IF TRAPPED ON A DESERTED ISLAND, Gen. Z chose TikTok as the no. 1 social media service they'd keep. Every other generation overwhelmingly chose Facebook. (Question inspired by @markmahaney!)
content.value:
You can't overstate how giant TikTok has become, so quickly, among younger consumers.

IF TRAPPED ON A DESERTED ISLAND, Gen. Z chose TikTok as the no. 1 social media service they'd keep. Every other generation overwhelmingly chose Facebook. 

(Question inspired by @markmahaney!)
